title: Grave Prophecies
description: Book two in the Prophecies of Angels and Demons TrilogyWhat if everything you knew was a lie?It’s been a busy summer. Things are heating up in Allie’s relationship with Simon and college is just on the horizon, but when school starts, so do all her problems.Just when she’s ready to set off for college, a man from her past returns to stir up trouble, then students on campus start turning up dead. Worst of all, Simon’s been keeping late hours at work. Is it trouble in paradise, or can he be trusted?The more Allie learns about her past, the more secrets there are to unravel.After uncovering a prophecy foretelling the end of life as she knows it, she'll need to rely on the help of a few unlikely allies to solve a mystery that may lead to the ultimate sacrifice.If that weren't enough, Gabriel has found himself in hot water, but friends willing to come to his aid are in short supply. Perhaps keeping everyone at arm's length for eternity wasn't the best plan after all.Grave Prophecies is a dark urban fantasy story, recommended for 18+ due to mature content.
author: Cassandra Aston
